warning_message: DANGER: Mixing bleach with ammonia or acids creates toxic chlorine/chloramine gas
safe_alternative: Never mix cleaning products. Use one at a time with good ventilation

warning_message: Adding water to concentrated acid causes violent exothermic reaction and splashing
safe_alternative: Always Add Acid to water (AAA rule), slowly with stirring

warning_message: Dry ice in enclosed spaces causes suffocation; in sealed containers it can explode
safe_alternative: Use dry ice only in ventilated areas, never in airtight containers

warning_message: Chlorinated solvents near welding create phosgene gas - deadly even in small amounts
safe_alternative: Never weld near chlorinated solvents, ensure complete ventilation

warning_message: Gasoline vapors are extremely flammable and toxic
safe_alternative: Use proper degreasers or parts cleaner in ventilated areas

warning_message: Adding gas to fire causes explosive flash fires and severe burns
safe_alternative: Use proper fire starters, never add accelerants to existing flames
